Health Status
Summary of Hospitalization :
This **AGE[in 50s] year old AA female with h/o SCA admitted to MICU **DATE[Apr 8 07] with c/o cough + green sputum , abd pain , N/V
Past Medical History :
SCA
Hepatitis C
ICH **DATE[Mar 2004]
Chronic Pain
Subjective / Events Overnight :
Pt without complaints .
Physical Exam
General Appearance :
NAD .
Cardiovascular :
IRRR .
Respiratory :
Fine crackles in bases ; neg. wheezes .
Gastrointestinal :
+ BS , soft , distended .
Musculoskeletal :
+ 2 /+ 3 B LE edema ankle to thigh .
+ 2 B UE edema , greater RUE .
Neurological :
AAO .
Speech clear and appropriate .
+ infusaport  .
General Results
Today 's results :
ALLRESLTSECT
**DATE[Apr 29 2007] 12:07 PM
Discharge Plan
DP
( Preliminary )
**DATE[Apr 29 2007] 4:00 AM
Na 145 mEq / L
K 5.3 mEq / L High
Cl 110 mEq / L
CO2 22 mEq / L
Anion Gap 13.0 High
BUN 74 mg / dL Critical High
Cr 5.5 mg / dL Critical High
GFR ( estimated ) 10.00 mL / min / 1.73 m2 Low
( Modified )
Ca 8.1 mg / dL Low
Mg 1.4 mEq / L
Phos 7.3 mg / dL High
Impression and Plan
Impression
Plan
Heme - h/o SCA .
Admitted in crisis .
On Aranesp .
On Oxycontin TID and prn po/IV Dilaudid .
Pulmonary - h/o asthma - Duonebs prn ; PNA - Cefepime D/c 'd - completed full course .
On po prednisone - adjusted as needed .
HEENT - Group A Strep Throat - Completed 10 day Amoxil course .
Otalgia / inc . hearing loss - ENT c/s - Floxin Otic - completed course .
Improved hearing .
Cards - A fib - On Cardizem 60 mg QID - cont to monitor .
GI - Hepatic encephalopathy - Lactulose BID .
Monitor ammonia .
Renal - **INITIALS - IV Lasix 80 mg Q AM - monitor CXR .
Appreciate Renal c/s -
Renal US - IMPRESSION :
1. ECHOGENIC KIDNEYS COMPATIBLE WITH RENAL PARENCHYMAL DISEASE , WHICH CORRELATES WITH RECENT ABDOMINAL MR FINDINGS .
2. NO HYDRONEPHROSIS .
3. SMALL TO MODERATE PELVIC ASCITES .
On phosLo .
Sodium bicarb prn b/c of concern of the sodium .
Pt to receive TDC tomorrow for HD .
Neuro - Diffuse weakness of ext - CTH negative .
PT / OT .
Pt 's strength is improving .
Vasc - RUE swelling and pain - RUE doppler prelim neg .
Proph - SQ Heparin .
ID - Leukocytosis - probably from steroids .
CXR noted and blood and urine cultures no growth .
C-diff neg .
Changing steroids to po .
? secondary to SSC .
DM - Elevated blood sugars ~ 200 s - consider SSI .
Disposition - Pending .
Pt will need SNF placement ( HD ) .
Family contacts :
Daughter **NAME[VVV] **PHONE ( **PLACE ); Mother **PLACE **PHONE ( Arizona ) .
Professional Services
Credentials and Title of Author **NAME[UUU] Signing this Document : PA-C
Perform by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 29 2007] 20:05 )
Sign by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 29 2007] 20:05 )
VERIFY by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 29 2007] 20:05 )
